name: GRAVITON (itch) (Graviton2002)
description:
我是一位中国独立游戏开发者，目前在读大二

这是我的第一款作品，目的在于探讨一个异常物理法则的加入会与现实产生怎样的互动

游戏本身还不完善，美术加工很粗糙，还可能会遇到很多bug，如果有请记得反馈给我哦

故事发生在距离地球最近的黑洞中轨道的一座空间站上，你独自一人醒来，发现周围都是破败而缺少维护的设备。这里的研究似乎和反物质有关，但是所有人都不见了。随着调查和探索的深入你将学到很多与反物质有关的知识，并利用他们跨越障碍。一场危机将在你眼前逐渐清晰起来

The following is translated using translation software：

I'm a Chinese indie game developer and in my sophomore year at present

This is my first work, and the purpose is to explore how the introduction of an abnormal physical law will interact with reality

The game itself is not perfect, the art is very rough, and there may be a lot of bugs, please remember to feedback me if you found one

You wake up alone on a space station in a medium orbiting the closest black hole to Earth, surrounded by dilapidated and poorly maintained equipment. The research here seems to be about antimatter, but everyone's gone. As you investigate and explore further you will learn a lot about antimatter and use it to overcome obstacles. A crisis will become clear before your eyes

It is currently only updated to the Quadrant 2
